short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helping de-crap-ify the interwebs by providing highly-readable, text-only versions of sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scrubr is a tool that helps you de-crap-ify the internet by scrubbing all the junk out of webpages and giving you highly-readable, text-only versions.

With the Scrubr Chrome extension you can right-click to send any webpage directly to Scrubr for cleaning.

Sign up for a free Scrubr account to save, edit and share your cleaned pages.

What can we clean for you today?
